section_description:
TAD:
https://company-wiki.example.com/spaces/EN/pages/2932638057/QA+Plan+Offline+mode

- Currently fully rolled out to iOS users 
- Targeting Android users via experiment: `mobile_offline_mode_feature`
title: Offline mode: Scrolling after coming back online (Open Shifts)

custom_steps_separated.content: Having your internet enabled, navigate to the open shifts screen, and make sure that there are shifts listed
Being there in the open shifts screen, disable your internet connection
custom_steps_separated.expected:
There should be a banner in the bottom of the screen with the text:

"You seem to be offline, check your connection  Reload"


 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/nop12345-4444-5555-6666-777777777701)

custom_steps_separated.content: Tap on the reload CTA visible in the bottom of the screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Should be able to re-load the screen

Yellow banner at the top with “Try again” should be visible


 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/nop12345-4444-5555-6666-777777777702)

custom_steps_separated.content: Enable your internet again, and scroll to the bottom of the list, so that the UI attempts to lazy load more shifts
custom_steps_separated.expected: The UI is now able to load more shifts into the list
